item.description:
For this Meetup, we'll try some Community Theater.  Let's see The Community Player's performance of "Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street." Here is their description of the play:

"The rare instance of a musical thriller, Stephen Sondheim and Hugh Wheeler’s chilling, suspenseful, heart-pounding masterpiece of murderous barber-ism and culinary crime tells the infamous tale of the unjustly exiled barber who returns to 19th century London seeking revenge against the lecherous judge who framed him and ravaged his young wife. His thirst for blood soon expands to include his unfortunate customers, and the resourceful proprietress of the pie shop downstairs soon has the people of London lining up in droves with her mysterious new meat pie recipe!"

Ticket Information

Tickets are $20. Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. You may purchase tickets at the Community Player's Online Order site or call the Community Players at 401-726-6860.

Please Note that Friday nights may sell out.  Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Meet-up Logistics

Please be at the theater NO LATER than 7:30.  Seating is general admission and they will not be holding seats for us.  Seating is first-come;first-served, so please be prompt so we can all sit together. When you RSVP, I will provide my cell phone number in case you're running late or get lost.
item.how_to_find_us: In the Lobby of the Auditorium
item.name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
